response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional item with unmatched features and quality. Considering its value and what it offers, I believe we can come to a fair agreement. I kindly propose a purchase price of $9,500 for this product. This price reflects not only its market value but also allows us to maintain a reasonable profit margin. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a satisfactory arrangement.", "product_price": 9500}
